message: The relationship between td elements and their associated th elements is not defined. Use either the scope attribute on th elements, or the headers attribute on td elements.
If this table is a data table, consider using a caption element to the table element to identify this table.
If this table is a data table, consider using a caption element to the table element to identify this table.
selector: html > body > main > table > tbody > tr:nth-child(3) > th > table
